rules.name: Host_Header_for_Testing
rules.comments: This rule allows you to access your application using its endpoint URL, without changing DNS records.

pages.name: default
pages.body:
Server Error

404 - File or directory not found.

The resource you are looking for might have been removed, had its name changed, or is temporarily unavailable.

pages.name: default-access-denied-page
pages.body:
Authentication and Access Control

Access Denied
You do not have permission to access this resource. Please sign in or contact your administrator for access to this resource.

pages.name: default-captcha-response-page
pages.body:
Validation request

User validation required to continue..

Please type the text you see in the image into the text box and submit

[ Refresh the page to generate a new image. ]

Note:

  • If you get here while trying to submit a form, you may have to re-submit the form.
  • Access to this domain may need the browser to have javascript and cookie support enabled.

pages.name: default-captcha-sessions-error-page
pages.body: The specified URL is inaccessible at this time due to the load on the website from the same IP address. Please try after some time or from a different IP address.

pages.name: default-captcha-tries-error-page
pages.body: The specified URL is inaccessible at this time. Please try after some time.

pages.name: default-challenge-page
pages.body:
Authentication and Access Control

%s

pages.name: default-dual-login-failed-page
pages.body:
Authentication and Access Control

Error: Invalid Username/Password/Passcode
Please provide your username and password to access restricted applications.

pages.name: default-dual-login-page
pages.body:
Authentication and Access Control

Please provide your username and password to access restricted applications.

pages.name: default-error-resp
pages.body: The requested service is temporarily unavailable. It is either overloaded or under maintenance. Please try later.

pages.name: default-fingerprint-challenges-exceeded-page
pages.body:
The specified URL cannot be found.

You should enable JavaScript and cookies to have access to this website [Id: %log-id].

pages.name: default-graphql-response-page
pages.body: {"errors":[{"message": "Invalid Request", "Log-Id": "%log-id", "Request Time": "%attack-time"}]}

pages.name: default-hsts-redirect-page
pages.body:
The requested service can be accessed over HTTPS only.
URL to access the service would be https://%host:443%s

pages.name: default-idp-selection-page
pages.body:
Authentication and Access Control

Please select an IDP for authentication to access restricted applications.
MS Azure AD
Open IDP

pages.name: default-json-response-page
default-login-failed-page
pages.body:
Authentication and Access Control

Error: Invalid Username or Password
Please provide your username and password to access restricted applications.

pages.name: default-login-page
pages.body:
Authentication and Access Control

Please provide your username and password to access restricted applications.

pages.name: default-login-success-page
pages.body:
Authentication and Access Control

You have successfully signed in.
You now have access to restricted resources on this site based on your account permissions. Please remember to sign out.

pages.name: default-logout-success-page
pages.body:
Authentication and Access Control

You have successfully signed out.
Please sign in to access restricted resources on this site based on your account permissions.

pages.name: default-suspected-activity-error-page
pages.body: Suspected activity on the website, the URL requested is inaccessible at this time. Please try after some time or close and relaunch the browser and try again.

pages.name: default-virus
pages.body: The file uploaded to %host%s is found to be infected with a virus. Upload aborted.

policies.name: Suspicious Client Profile Risk Threshold Breached(426)

allowed_bots.name: Google
allowed_bots.extended_match: (Header User-Agent co googlebot) || (Header User-Agent co adsbot) || (Header User-Agent co mediapartners-google)

allowed_bots.name: Microsoft
allowed_bots.extended_match: (Header User-Agent co bingbot) || (Header User-Agent co msnbot)
